name: echo
description: repeats <message> back to thread

name: weather
description: sends the current weather in <city> to thread

name: space
description: sends a random space image to a thread

name: kick user
usage: kick <name of user> or kick <thread nickname>
description: kicks specified user from current thread

name: add user
description: adds specified user to current thread

name: color
description: changes color of current thread to <hex> or built-in colors

name: giphy
description: searches <phrase> on giphy and returns a relevant git

name: yesno
description: decides on an answer to any yes/no question and gives a (dis)approving gif

name: nickname
description: Sets the nickname of the given user

name: title
description: Sets the title of current thread

name: figlet
description: Replies with a figlet of <message>

name: preferences
description: sets one of the default preferences for this thread. use prefs list to show possible preferences.

name: emoji
description: sets the channel emoji to whatever is specified

name: cowsay
description: Replies with a cowsay of <message>

name: poll
description: Create a poll <message>

name: summary
description: Summarize a <link>

name: help
description: Show sadbot usage and descriptions

name: vote
description: Vote for a poll option

name: snippets
description: snippets

name: xkcd
description: xkcd

name: movie
description: Search a movie or TV Show

name: lmgtfy
description: generates a snarky link for ur dumb friends

name: wolfram
description: Query WolframAlpha

name: ping
description: send a pm to a user to get their attention

name: plusplus
description: give a user a nice lil karma boost

name: minusminus
description: be easy, god

name: karma
description: check a user's karma

name: pokedex
usage: pokedex <pokemon-name or pokemon-id> or pokedex move <move-name>
description: see information about a pokemon or move

name: weed
description: see information on cannabis strains

name: tldr
description: Get a short description of anything
